title: Swimming Pool, Beautiful Lake, Electric Vehicle Charging Stations
neighborhood: 5000 South Lincoln Trace Avenue, Atlanta, GA
posting_body: ['Schedule a Tour Today: <URL>', 'Discover the perfect place to call home at The Edison Apartments.', 'At our luxury apartments in Smyrna, GA, residents can choose from a variety one bedroom, two bedroom, and three bedroom homes and they can easily explore all that our community has to offer.', 'In each home, residents will find beautiful details like stainless steel appliances, spacious closets, and designer finishes.', 'Throughout the community at our Smyrna apartments, residents can take advantage of the stunning swimming pool, brand new clubhouse, and fully-equipped fitness center.', 'Amenities:', '-Ceiling Fans in Bedrooms', '-Pet Friendly', '-Crown Molding', '-Brand New Fitness Center', '-Electric Vehicle Charging Stations', '-Large Closets', '-Black Appliances or Stainless Steel Appliances Available', '-Faux-Wood Vinyl Flooring', '-W/D Hookup', '-Swimming Pool', '-Designer Finishes Available', '-Beautiful', 'Lake', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
